column2: With the breakup of the once mighty Mongol khanates that dominated Eurasia for centuries, the seed of ambition has been planted in the local powers of those fallen nations. Civil wars plague the Persian heartlands, the Ottoman Empire advances further into Christian Europe, and the French and Habsburgs have begun to take interest in the warring of the Italian states. The now unified Iberian peninsula have begun to look beyond Europe towards trade routes in Asia, but have discovered something even grander. With the fall of the old empires, the time is now to usher in a new age, molded by your judgement.
